title: Timing Your Testimony
description: Will you trust God’s timing? In “Timing Your Testimony,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church reveals that God’s faithfulness is always at work in our lives (but that His timing may not be what we expected).
dc:creator: Elevation Church
itunes:summary: Will you trust God’s timing? In “Timing Your Testimony,” Pastor Steven Furtick of Elevation Church reveals that God’s faithfulness is always at work in our lives (but that His timing may not be what we expected).
